SCTX:
Begin ColonyDralora


; controls enabling of NPC for quest CO_7, and initial force dialogue

short draltalked
short nolore

if ( ColonyState < 10 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
elseif ( ColonyState >= 10 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
		Enable
	endif
endif

if ( draltalked == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_7" >= 10 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_7" < 50 )
			if ( GetDistance "Player" <= 512 )
				ForceGreeting
				set draltalked to 1
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif


End ColonyDralora
